title: BRIEF-Unifor Says Transforce's "Failure" To Make Fair Wage Offer To Their Dynamex Couriers Has Forced Their Union To Serve 72-Hour Strike Notice
text:
BRIEF-Unifor Says Transforce's "Failure" To Make Fair Wage Offer To Their Dynamex Couriers Has Forced Their Union To Serve 72-Hour Strike Notice

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 07, 2019 15:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Unifor Says Transforce's "Failure" To Make Fair Wage Offer To Their Dynamex Couriers Has Forced Their Union To Serve 72-Hour Strike Notice Oct 7 (Reuters) - UNIFOR: * UNIFOR SAYS TRANSFORCE'S "FAILURE" TO MAKE FAIR WAGE OFFER TO THEIR DYNAMEX COURIERS HAS FORCED THEIR UNION TO SERVE 72-HOUR STRIKE NOTICE
